name: Boxed In (itch) (Sofox)
description:
You're trapped in a crate, can you figure a way out?

Uses mouse controls.

Developed in the Godot engine.

Note: The custom cursor may revert to regular cursor near edges of the screen. I only discovered this behaviour after uploading (since it does not happen when run natively), and spent extra time trying to alleviate this and another web-only bug related to the custom cursor.

Credits:

Made by Sofox and Mutley in 3 hours (each) for Trijam #170 with the theme: Life in a Box!

Music:

Title screen music - Sent Overboard by Jerry Lacey - https://www.epidemicsound.com/track/6drgLhw7jG/

Ending Music -Once Forlorn by Atlas Kind https://www.epidemicsound.com/track/LARL7fLm9e/
